The Linyou Cuimu Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in Linyou County, Shaanxi Province, China, with an annual production capacity of 4 million tons

operators: 陕西永陇能源开发建设有限责任公司 (Shaanxi Yonglong Energy Development Construction Co., Ltd.)
